[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1459859592495{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-7 vc_col-xs-12″][stm_slider slider_width=”600px”][stm_slider_item img_id=”1271″ img_size=”570×480″][stm_slider_item img_id=”1234″ img_size=”570×480″][/stm_slider][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”30px” md_spacing=”30px” sm_spacing=”45px” xs_spacing=”45px”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-5 vc_col-xs-12″][stm_title title_tag=”h2″ sep_color=”green” title=”Language Immersion Summer Camp” sep_enable=”true” sep_margin_b=”51px” title_line_height=”48px” title_margin_t=”-13px”]Register early — Camps fill quickly! With enough demand, we will open secondary sections of Popular Camps.[/stm_title][vc_column_text]Register early — Camps fill quickly! With enough demand, we will open secondary sections of Popular Camps.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][stm_title title_tag=”h4″ sep_color=”green” title=”2016 Camp Dates” sep_enable=”true”]Register early — Camps fill quickly! With enough demand, we will open secondary sections of Popular Camps.[/stm_title][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1455513885744{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”]Session 1: 6/20 — 7/1/16
Session 2: 7/5 — 7/15/16
(No Camp Monday July 4th)
Session 3: 7/18 — 7/29/16[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][stm_single_image img_id=”1266″ img_size=”200×173″ img_responsive_enable=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1460723717651{margin-top: 52px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1455335752397{padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 39px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][stm_title title_tag=”h2″ sep_color=”green” title=”Camp Includes” sep_enable=”true”][/stm_title][vc_column_text]

  • Small groups with teachers from around the world
  • Fun outdoor and indoor activities aimed at building language skills (songs, folktales, crafts, games, sports, and more)
  • Cultural performances
  • Ice-cream social
  • Special classes with trained specialists- yoga, sports & games
  • Exciting field days (water balloon toss, relay races, and more)
  • Fun, cultural music and movement classes for all campers! We will offer different opportunities each session — last year we learned Taiko Drumming, Kung-Fu Martial Arts, and Latin dance!
  • Field trips for Orange, Purple, Blue and Green camps! Specific information about each field trip will be released one week prior to the start of each camp session.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][stm_text_box title_tag=”h3″ sep_color=”custom” title_color=”custom” text_color=”custom” stm_bg_color=”green” bg_color=”green” title=”Camp at a Glance” sep_enable=”true” sep_color_custom=”#ffffff” text_color_custom=”#ffffff” padding_top=”39px” padding_right=”50px” padding_bottom=”44px” padding_left=”50px” title_color_custom=”#ffffff”]

  1.  Choose a language (Spanish, Chinese or Japanese)
  2. Choose a section appropriate for your child’s age and fluency level (see chart below)
  3. Choose the two-week session(s) you`d like to attend. All camp sections are available every session in Spanish, Chinese & Japanese

New exciting themes and activities every session. Have fun in one session or all three![/stm_text_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1455779313595{padding-top: 38px !important;padding-bottom: 108px !important;}”][vc_column][stm_title title_tag=”h2″ sep_color=”green” title=”Popular Camps” sep_enable=”true”][/stm_title][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1455780457095{padding-bottom: 17px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Children will enjoy a world of fun this summer while learning Chinese, Spanish or Japanese. International language and culture will come to life through hands-on projects, stories, songs, games and outdoor fun with our natively-fluent staff.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Whether learning a new language or already fluent, campers will love our summer traditions of field days, trips, performances, ice creams, and more!

Questions? Contact us at summer@stylemixthemes.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][stm_pricing_tables
